Package com.group12.helper

Class GameBoardSetupHelper

java.lang.Object
com.group12.helper.GameBoardSetupHelper
public class GameBoardSetupHelper extends Object
The GameBoardSetupHelper class is responsible for having helper methods about setting up the board for offline (against CPU) games.

      - List of optional settlement places.

    • setupBoardTiles

      public static void setupBoardTiles(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane anchorPane, ArrayList<javafx.scene.text.Text> tileTextList)
      A method to set attributes of the hexagonal tiles of the map. Randomizes the numbers and resource types for the tiles.
      Parameters:
      anchorPane - - Main pane of the gameView scene.
      tileTextList - - A list of all hexagonal tiles' list.

    • setResourceAtSetup

      public static void setResourceAtSetup(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane anchorPane, CPUPlayer cpuPlayer, String cpuCircleId)
      A helper method for cpu to gather resources at the second turn of the setup phase.
      Parameters:
      anchorPane - - Main pane of the gameView scene.
      cpuPlayer - - The cpu player which is playing.
      cpuCircleId - - Circle id which cpu player has built its settlement on.

    • CPUSetup

      public static void CPUSetup(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane anchorPane, CPUPlayer cpuOrange, CPUPlayer cpuGreen, CPUPlayer cpuPink, ArrayList<String> occupiedCircles, ArrayList<String> occupiedEdges)
      A method to allow CPU players to play in order while in setup phase.
      Parameters:
      anchorPane -
      cpuOrange - - Orange cpu player
      cpuGreen - - Green cpu player
      cpuPink - - Pink cpu player
      occupiedCircles - - Settlement positions that are already occupied by other players.
      occupiedEdges - - Road positions that are already occupied by other players.
